name: HomeBeforeDark
0:
”Alexa, open Home Before Dark”
”Alexa, start Home Before Dark”
”Alexa, ask Home Before Dark”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: home before dark
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Home Before Dark Podcast Network currently offers the main Home Before Dark show as well as an Atlanta United FC Weekly podcast, both hosted by Kevin Bradley and Tim Herb. With more shows in the pipeline, the Home Before Dark Podcast Network is bringing you all the best Atlanta-based podcast content available today, covering a vast variety of content - video games, movies, television, pop culture, trivia, sports, the arts, and general lifestyle.

Home Before Dark hearkens back to a time when you and your friends in the neighborhood were forced inside. Where you discovered a level of brotherhood/sisterhood that could only be forged through playing video games, watching movies, television and discussing the finer things in life over an Orange Lavaburst Hi-C and Bagel Bites. We take the time out to talk about the current games we're playing, movies we've seen recently(new or old) and all the things in between. It’s almost that time. The streetlights just came on and you had better leave soon to be Home Before Dark.

Here are a few quick tips when navigating our skill. The First thing to note, when opening the skill you’ll be playing the latest episode, but if that’s not what you’re looking for, you can always find something more specific. This skill allows you to play next or previous episode. In addition, you can ask the skill to play the newest or oldest episodes or if you want to get specific, play a specific episode by saying the episode number. Try some of these commands:

**Next/Previous Episode**
— [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, next”
— [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, previous”

**Select Latest Episode**
— “Alexa, ask Home Before Dark to play latest episode” 

**Select First Episode**
— “Alexa, ask Home Before Dark to start from first episode”
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
